physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neutropenic febrile illness. Urine culture showed Klebsiella species.
White blood cell count was 0.1 × 10^9/L. Started receiving GM-CSF.
Became afebrile. White blood cell count increased to 7.2 × 10^9/L.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in white blood cell count.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bone marrow biopsy showed complete engraftment and no evidence of residual myeloma.

physical_examinations.date: Beginning of the third month after transplantation
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Small depigmented macules started to appear.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased depigmentation spread over a period of 1 year.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Atrophic scaly plaques localized to the left posterior shoulder for 2 months; mild keratoconjunctivitis sicca, xerostomia, and dysphagia present.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Presence of localized GVHD plaques along with extensive vitiligo.
